channel.title: tensorflow on Random codewalks
channel.description: Recent content in tensorflow on Random codewalks

item.title: Using your tensorflow model with go
item.description: This post will serve as a simple end-to-end example of how to use your own tensorflow-model to do inference in your go-application. You will need to train your own model with tensorflow in order to make it work properly. If you are doing inference in java (or any other language) the blogpost will still be useful since the principles are the same for languages with bindings to tensorflow. TLDR; Name your tensors and operations in the tensorflow graph before exporting the model.
